Content: The strike launched by the staff of all hospitals within the Uva Province protesting against the Uva Provincial Chief Minister continued for the second day today. 21 more Trade Unions have joined in supporting this work stoppage. Doctors as well as the hospital staff commenced this protest campaign yesterday expressing their protest over the defamatory attack made on the Badulla Regional Health Services Director. Uva Provincial Coordinator of the Government Medical Officers Association Dr. Palitha Rajapaksa said that their protest was in place today too. Doctors claim that the Uva Provincial Chief Minister should be responsible for the inconvenience caused to the patients.
